messages.subject: Re: eBay Seller mrvtjun
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Brian, ... other ... I ve actually got a combined shipping from them for 2 tsuba. It was 2- 3 months ago, so I don t know, maybe they aren t doing it
messages.messageBody:
Hi Brian,

> Hmm...there are already posts a short while ago about him. Seems
> generally ok.
> Watch the postage though if your country is not listed..
> $21 postage on a small tsuba??
> And seems like they won't combine shipping to save you money on
other
> items won...some funny excuse about company policy or something.

I've actually got a combined shipping from them for 2 tsuba. It was 2-
3 months ago, so I don't know, maybe they aren't doing it anymore.

Again, personally, I've got no major complaints about this seller:
shipping was fast, well packaged in respect to tsuba, etc. I wouldn't
hesitate to buy from him again once I see something I'd be interested
in.

Regards,
Stan

messages.subject: Re: eBay Seller mrvtjun
messages.msgSnippet: Not an endorsement , but rather my acknowledgement of a well handled sale...I gave positive feedback after receiving my purchase.  The service was fast and I
messages.messageBody:
Not an "endorsement", but rather my acknowledgement of a well handled
sale...I gave positive feedback after receiving my purchase. The
service was fast and I liked what I received.

I try to judge both the item and the seller. I would have no
reservations placing another bid after my initial experience with
mrvtjun.


Sincerely,

Michael Harris

messages.messageBody:
Hmm...there are already posts a short while ago about him. Seems
generally ok.
Watch the postage though if your country is not listed..
$21 postage on a small tsuba??
And seems like they won't combine shipping to save you money on other
items won...some funny excuse about company policy or something.

Brian
